# Process
# 1. Input N and K
# 2. If N % K == 0 -> N = N - K
# 3. Else -> N = N % K

# 1. Input N and K
N, K = map(int, input().split())

# 2. If N % K == 0 -> N = N - K
if N % K == 0:
    N = N - K

# 3. Else -> N = N % K
else:
    N = N % K

# 4. Output N
print(N)

import sys

# n = int(input())

# a = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
# s = input()
# s = input().rstrip().split(' ')
# n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if n % k == 0:
    ans = 0
else:
    ans = 1
print(ans)
